recipe.title: Baked Shrimp in Chipotle Sauce
ingredients: 1 to 2 canned chipotle chiles in adobo, minced, plus 2 to 3 teaspoons adobo sauce
instructions: Melt butter in a saucepan and stir in wine, Worcestershire sauce, chipotles, adobo sauce, garlic, and salt. Toss shrimp with sauce in a large shallow baking dish and bake in middle of oven until shrimp are just cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes.
